<?php
// List all plugins to see what was installed
$plugins = get_plugins();
foreach ($plugins as $plugin_file => $plugin_data) {
    if (strpos($plugin_file, 'hidden-gems') !== false) {
        echo 'Found plugin: ' . $plugin_file . ' - ' . $plugin_data['Name'] . "\n";
        // Try to activate it
        activate_plugin($plugin_file);
        echo 'Activated: ' . $plugin_file . "\n";
    }
}
?>
